summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing execution of a Memorandum of Understanding to amend Appendix "D" of the collective bargaining agreement between The City of Seattle and Seattle Police Officers' Guild, which is effective through August 31, 1986; providing a 1.5% salary adjustment effective through August 31, 1986 providing a 1.5% salary adjustment effective September 1, 1986, to certain employees of the Seattle Police Department; and providing payment therefor.
